column4: if i want to live life dangerously.. what command line could i use to force a dist-upgrade?
you can't just issue a command without first change your repo listing in /etc/apt/sources.list
o.k.  i thought there was a way to force it... guess not... just change all the dapper to edgy?
ask in #ubuntu+1 please, as this channel is for stable (currently dapper)
